llm_res.rule: The approve function must throw unless msg.sender is the current NFT owner, or an authorized operator of the current owner.
Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
The setApprovalForAll function must allow multiple operators per owner.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
